sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SCHAZK, a city of Russia, the capital of a circle of the same name, within the province of Tambov. It is 737 miles from St Petersburg, on the river Schazk. It is old and ill built, and contains eight churches, only three of stone, 1011 houses, with 6800 inhabitants, chiefly making hempen goods, and cultivating that plant. Long. 4L 49. E. Lat. 54. 26. N.
